inference:
Solution:

The area of the shaded region is the area of the large circle minus the areas of the two small circles. The radius of the large circle is 6, so its area is $\pi(6^2) = 36\pi$.  The radius of each small circle is 2, so the area of each small circle is $\pi(2^2) = 4\pi$.  The area of the shaded region is $36\pi - 2(4\pi) = \boxed{28\pi}$. I hope it is correct.
